about_the_game:
By purchasing a support pack, you will help speed up and improve the work on Efir Adventure: Matchcraft, and as a bonus you will receive additional bonuses that expand the capabilities of the game.

Your support is very important for the development and improvement of the game.

This support pack includes:

- Additional limit of random combat missions: 2
- Additional storage spaces: 8
- Additional expedition limit: 1
- Additional order limit: 1
- Additional quest limit: 2
- Additional limit of market offers: 1
